name: Chef Regretulus, the Five-Star Fleshsmith
description: Once a top-rated galactic TV chef, Regretulus now resides on Floor 7's kitchen-themed dungeon wing, forever cursed to refine meat-based horror into culinary chaos. Wears a blood-stained apron and wields a flamethrower spatula.

abilities.name: Sous Vide Sear
abilities.description: Targets a random player with a jet of superheated mist, applying Burning Flesh (DoT) that intensifies near boiling cauldrons.

abilities.name: Exploding Charcuterie
abilities.description: Tosses a meat-and-dynamite platter that explodes in an AOE, leaving greasy hazards on the floor.

abilities.name: Taste of Regret
abilities.description: Consumes a nearby corpse or minion to heal and emit a fear-inducing belch that reduces player defense for 10 seconds.

name: Professor Grey Matter, the Uselessly Overqualified Brain
description: A floating, mutated alien brain in a VR headset attached to a failing drone platform. Rants constantly about his unappreciated credentials while launching psychic assaults. Found in Floor 8’s techno-library.

abilities.name: Thesis Beam
abilities.description: Fires a concentrated logic laser that deals psychic damage and silences any player who’s recently used an ability.

abilities.name: Overanalyze
abilities.description: Targets the player with the most buffs, confusing them for 6 seconds while they 'debate themselves.'

abilities.name: Bibliocaust
abilities.description: Summons a rain of flaming encyclopedias from the ceiling, creating a chaotic AOE hazard zone.

name: Chucklegrin, the Final Clown
description: The last surviving warrior of the Laughing Court, Chucklegrin fuses necromancy with carnival aesthetics. A truly awful jester, he juggles skulls and shouts puns that cause actual bleeding.

abilities.name: Dead Man's Punchline
abilities.description: Fires off a joke so bad it deals psychic damage and stuns anyone who fails a laugh check.

abilities.name: Balloon Animal Horror
abilities.description: Summons a twisted balloon beast that hunts a random player until popped (or fed candy).

abilities.name: Paint the Tent Red
abilities.description: Spins violently in place, flinging knives, confetti, and body parts in a deadly circular AOE.
